issue.title: Investigate parsing Lego Digital Designer output

content.raw: The python script doesn't depend on ROS, so it can be run from any system that can run python scripts. It worked in my mac and linux machine on the tutorial example files, so I'd assume it would also work from windows. I'm working on installing LDD and creating my own models to see how easy it is. For what its worth, LDD only runs on windows and mac.
content.html: The python script doesn't depend on ROS, so it can be run from any system that can run python scripts.
